thread.title: KFC’s Delicious “Chizza” Mash-up Pizza Features “Chicken Ham” Topping
thread.title_full: KFC’s Delicious “Chizza” Mash-up Pizza Features “Chicken Ham” Topping

author: Graeme Campbell
title: KFC’s Delicious “Chizza” Mash-up Pizza Features “Chicken Ham” Topping
text:
Fair play to the tastemakers and recipe dudes out there in the Philippines because they clearly DGAF. After Taco Bell horrified us with this jalapeno-flavored Cheetos Quasaedalia monstrosity, KFC’s “Chizza” takes the experimentalism even further.
A portmanteau of the words “chicken” and “pizza” (how long did it take to think that one up, guys?) the avant-garde dish is described by The Colonel as, “the ultimate mash-up of chicken and pizza.” In theory, such a carb-free, high-protein alternative actually makes sense, but to look at the finished product is actually kind of depressing. Really, it’s just a deep fried chicken breast with a bunch of incongruous pizza toppings bashed on top.
Watch how #KFCChizza , the #UltimateMashup of Chicken and Pizza is made! pic.twitter.com/Jw9ZBmruVI 
— KFC_SG (@KFC_SG) February 8, 2017 

Pizza sauce, chicken ham (yes, chicken ham), pineapple chunks and mozzarella cheese sauce is curdled together for something that resembles some kind of space fetus. I mean, seriously, how stoned would you have to be to eat that? Here’s a closer look at the dystopian grub.
Adding on to the list of #KFC #chizza disappointments… pic.twitter.com/teM913fd2N 
— Eric Loh (@ericlohh) February 10, 2017 

Chizza rating 7/10. they say expectation leads to disappointment pic.twitter.com/svAA9iP6ep 
— Shiqah Ali. (@shiqahali) February 8, 2017 

Chizza its taste like soggy salty meat…
— Gyflux Deng (@KuzukiRyuuji) February 10, 2017 

Sorry, Colonel, but it looks like this one needs a rethink. If, for some bizarre reason, the above has whet your appetite, then check the Chizza out at most KFC Philippines locations now.
In other food and drinks news, have you heard of the magic Coca-Cola that’s actively good for you?
